messages.subject: If you like the last samurai
messages.msgSnippet: If you guys enjoyed the last samurai that much, I think it would be in great intrest for you to go and buy SHOGUN it is really good and 12hours long its on dvd
messages.messageBody:
If you guys enjoyed the last samurai that much, I think it would be in great
